subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: Lisby
full_text:
On Aug 17, 2008, at 8:57 PM, black bear hollow wrote:
>
> First off, the Fish Group aren't "people". They are not and haven't  
> ever been human. I have no idea where you get this idea. <<





I said that because all of the examples I heard of EVP by the Fish  
Group has sounded very human and they have never claimed to have been  
other than human that I have heard. I have to base my conclusions on  
the EVP files, not speculation, even from the victims. Do you know of  
instances where they audibly claimed to be nonhuman? I may have  
missed them--I heard a lot of EVPs from them, but certainly not the  
sum total. (As I said--I even got one myself the other day.)

I think you're right that they are definitely mobile, and a collective.

Ann
